what is the CUT timezone :thinking:
coordinated universal time I think, aka UTC. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time#Etymology
never heard of anyone using CUT as the abbreviation esp for computers. it's always been UTC. and if that's the case the local time has drifted by 50 minutes?

looks like the "network time" is just wrong
